title: Ebro In The Morning - French Montana Speaks Candidly On His Career + Recovery
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
French Montana sits down with Ebro in the Morning for a very honest conversation about his career, some of his biggest features, Chinx, Fat Joe & Ja Rule Verzuz, the Ye and Drake beef & his own Verzuz battle, and shares rare stories about Big Pun, Steve Rifkin, and much more!

He also discusses his recovery following previously being in the ICU, living a healthier lifestyle, where Chinx would be today, finding a hit, what tracks him and Drake have in the vault, and much more!

His new project, 'They Got Amnesia' is available Friday, November 19! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
